description.para: CAR class identifier,identifies a specified CAR class uniquely.

struct_member.mem_description: Address of CAR component in the Internet, for example: http://www.koretide.com.cn/car/hello.dll

remarks.para: EzCLSID is the extension of CLSID. EzCLSID struct includes uunm information.

Note: In CAR, when using EzCLSID struct as interface parameter, usually we use it to create object.We use CLSID as parameter, since CLSID struct does not include uunm information. When running component on Elastos, there is no way to find the location of the component and to create object successfully.
